description: Framed letter and envelope written by M.de Mazarin authenticating the cup and saucer as gift of Marie Antoinette to family from whom he bought it. Letter written to Dr. Baldwin, Florence, 1896. Framed. The cup and saucer letter refers to are listed under L84.77.24.1,2
title: Framed Letter and Envelope Authenticating Cup and Saucer
